description: Comedian, actor, and writer Craig Shoemaker presents a stand-up performance filmed live at the San Jose Improv comedy club.
name: Craig Shoemaker: Live - That's a True Story!

original_info.id: Craig Shoemaker: Live: That's a True Story!_2004
original_info.name: Craig Shoemaker: Live: That's a True Story!

review.name: Similar to 2007's The Lovemaster Unzipped - watch that one!
review.reviewBody: 4/28/18. Shoemaker is pretty funny. Lots of good laughs. Does some good impressions. He could probably be a good theater singer draw if he got serious. Most of the material in this standup is repeated in 2007's "The Lovemaster Unzipped, and bit better than this one.
